metadata.description: Long before Marilyn, and Madonna, Betty ‘boop-boop-a-dooped’ and wriggled her way into hearts worldwide with her unique mix of wide-eyed innocence and powerful cartoon sensuality.  This collection lovely restores the Betty Boop comic strips back to their original glory, in Betty’s original Sunday adventures as they appeared in the funny pages of daily newspapers in the 1930’s, capturing all the cheeky fun embodied by the character.
metadata.name: The Definitive Betty Boop
